title: BOC user wants to receive an error if adding an extension to Rehab Assignment for player that is no longer on Rehab Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user has an existing, Approved "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx open for a player in edit mode
AND user has added a new Extension to the tx
BUT the selected player has already been returned from rehab assignment
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A player must currently be on rehab assignment in order to add an extension. The player was returned from this Rehab Assignment on {0}. " ({0} should be replaced with the Return from Rehab date from the Return associated with this rehab placement)
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: User wants saving an Approved Rehab Assignment to check if valid number of extension days are entered on tx if it's a Continuation of Rehab - Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged
AND user is viewing an Approved "Rehab Assignment" tx for a pitcher
AND the "Reason for Rehab" on the tx is set to "Continuation of Rehab"
AND the player has a previous rehab assignment but does NOT have a subsequent "Reinstate from DL" tx
AND value entered for # Days for Rehab + the # days player spent on rehab during his previous assignment + total # days entered in extensions is greater than 30
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher is only allowed a total of 30 days of consecutive rehab assignments. Current total: {0}."
AND "{0}" should reflect total # days entered on this form as well as previously completed rehab days
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC Only)

title: User wants saving an Approved Rehab Assignment to check if valid number of extension days are entered on tx if it's a Continuation of Rehab - Non-Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged
AND user is viewing an Approved "Rehab Assignment" tx for a position player
AND the "Reason for Rehab" on the tx is set to "Continuation of Rehab"
AND the player has a previous rehab assignment but does NOT have a subsequent "Reinstate from DL" tx
AND value entered for # Days for Rehab + the # days player spent on rehab during his previous assignment + total # days entered in extensions is greater than 20
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A non-pitcher is only allowed a total of 20 days of consecutive rehab assignments. Current total: {0}."
AND "{0}" should reflect total # days entered on this form as well as previously completed rehab days
AND Clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC Only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment too close to player's injury date - Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to "Submit" or "Approve" a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a Pitcher at MJ level
AND player's current or pending MJ Roster status is 15-Day DL or 60-Day DL
AND assignment date entered on tx is fewer than 7 days after the player's last Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher may only be placed on rehab {7} days after Injury Date. Current value: {1}." ({1} reflects the number of days that have currently passed since the player's last Injury Date up to the entered Assignment Date)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment too close to player's injury date - Position Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to "Submit" or "Approve" a "Place on Rehab Assignment" tx for a Position Player at MJ level
AND player's current or pending MJ Roster status is 15-Day DL or 60-Day DL
AND assignment date entered on tx is fewer than 5 days after the player's last Injury Date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A non-pitcher may only be placed on rehab {5} days after Injury Date. Current value: {1}." ({1} reflects the number of days that have currently passed since the player's last Injury Date up to the entered Assignment Date)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment for a player that was recently returned from rehab due to a new injury - Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to create a Rehab Assignment tx for a pitcher
AND player was previously returned from rehab with "New Injury" checkbox checked
AND player does not have a subsequent "Reinstatement  from DL" tx
AND entered Assignment Date is fewer than 7 days after "Return from Rehab" date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "A pitcher may only be placed on rehab {7} days after his last Return from Rehab Date if he sustained a new injury. Current value: {1}."
AND "{1}" should reflect # of days since the player's Return from Rehab up until entered Assignment Date
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC Only)

title: User receives error if submitting Rehab Assignment for a player that was recently returned from rehab due to a new injury - Non-Pitcher
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to create a Rehab Assignment tx for a position player
AND player was previously returned from rehab with "New Injury" checkbox checked
AND player does not have a subsequent "Reinstatement from DL" tx
AND entered Assignment Date is fewer than 5 days after "Return from Rehab" date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
Expected Result
THEN system should display error "A non-pitcher may only be placed on rehab {5} days after his last Return from Rehab Date if he sustained a new injury. Current value: {1}."
AND "{1}" should reflect # of days since the player's Return from Rehab up until entered Assignment Date
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the tx
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC Only)

title: User wants to view an existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Return from Rehab tx already exists for a player
AND BOC or Club user can see the transaction in the player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction in the player history
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery and wireframe
AND clicking grey "Close" button will return user to their entry point into the transaction
AND field Current Status will display in red if the transaction is in a preliminary state, green if pending and black for all other states.

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary, submitted, or rejected Return from Rehab tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history - Submitted tx exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a submitted "Return from Rehab" transaction already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" should cause the system to load the existing submitted transaction in view mode
AND all fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to create a new Return from Rehab tx from player history - Preliminary or Rejected tx exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary or rejected "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Return from Rehab" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Return from Rehab" should cause the system to load the existing preliminary or rejected transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to submit a Return from Rehab tx to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a "Return from Rehab" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary or rejected state
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Submit to BOC" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run required field and format check
AND any errors should cause the system to generate an error message
AND once all rules pass the system should update transaction status to "Submitted to BOC"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode
AND system should display successful save blue notification #76
AND If the player’s pending MJ roster status is Rehab 60 Day DL, then set the player’s MJ pending roster status to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL, then it should be set to 7 Day Concussion DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Rehab 15 Day DL, then it should be set to 15 Day DL.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Restricted/Assigned then it should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s pending MJ roster status was Suspended/Assigned then it should be set to Suspended.
AND system should create an entry in green font in Player's Player History: Code = RHBRT, Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields
AND an approval item should be generated and display on the BOC - Major Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
AND any attached files should be displayed and available for download from the attachments column of the Approvals Widget
AND any populated comments should be displayed in the comments column of the Approvals Widget
AND clicking Player Name hyperlink should open Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab
AND clicking Type hyperlink should open the submitted transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC user wants to approve a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
AND a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND transaction is in Preliminary, Submitted to BOC, or Rejected state
AND BOC user sees "Approve" button in blue on the transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed or been overridden transaction status should be updated to "Approved"
AND if item was in edit mode it is reloaded in view mode
AND successful save blue notification is displayed (message #80)
AND item is removed from approvals clipboard
AND player's Player History is updated: Code = RHBRT Description = Return from Rehab, From Org/Club and To Org/Club fields to be in black font
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Rehab 60 Day DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 60 Day DL.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 7 Day Concussion DL.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Rehab 15 Day DL, then player's MJ roster status should be set to 15 Day DL.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Restricted/Assigned, then player's MJ roster status should be set to Restricted.
AND If player’s MJ roster status was Suspended/Assigned, then player's MJ roster status should be set to Suspended.
AND Rehab Club should be set to null

title: BOC user wants to reject a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC user
AND user is viewing a Submitted "Return from Rehab" tx
AND BOC user sees "Reject" button on the transaction in view or edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject"
custom_expected:
THEN once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND player's Rehab Club should be set to value in history prior to transaction submission
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

title: BOC user wants to be able to reverse a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND user should see a "Suppress" button on the Reversed tx
AND player's Club, MJ and MN roster statuses, and level of play should update to their values from prior to the tx being approved

title: BOC user wants to be able to suppress a reversed Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to be able to reverse and suppress a Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to "Reverse and Suppress" the transaction
AND grey "Reverse and Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Reverse and Suppress" from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will first be reversed
AND player's Club, MJ, and MN Roster statuses and level of play should be updated to their values from prior to transaction approval
AND transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to be prevented from reversing a Return from Rehab Assignment tx - Not latest approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
AND player has one or more approved transactions dated later than selected transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Return from Rehab" tx reaches an "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Return from Rehab"  tx reaches a "Rejected" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Return from Rehab tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND tx is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Return from Rehab" tx reaches an "Reversed" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: User wants to be able to delete Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary or Rejected state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Delete" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this ["Return from Rehab"]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: User wants approving Return from Rehab tx to create entry in the daily transaction bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" transaction has been initiated for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the transaction reaches "Approved" state
custom_expected: THEN transaction should appear on the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as Return from Rehab from [Insert Current Assignment] by [Insert return to org/club]

title: BOC user wants reversing a Return from Rehab tx to create entry in Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a previously approved "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN status of approved tx is updated to "Reversed"
custom_expected:
THEN previous "Approved" bulletin entry should be removed from pending Daily Transaction Bulletin
OR if it was on a previous Bulletin, then a new entry should be added to the current Pending Daily Transaction Bulletin as "Return from Rehab from [Insert Current Assignment] by [Insert return to org/club]- Reversed"

title: BOC user wants "reversed" bulletin entry removed from pending daily bulletin when tx is suppressed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a previously reversed "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND "reversed" bulletin entry for the tx is on the Pending Bulletin
custom_steps: WHEN the tx is suppressed
custom_expected: THEN "reversed" bulletin entry should be removed from the daily bulletin

title: BOC User wants to edit existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: BOC User wants to edit existing Return from Rehab tx - Approved or Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes fields
AND user should be able to edit any other part of the transaction not specifically stated as not editable post-approval in the data discovery.

title: Club User wants to edit existing Return from Rehab tx - Preliminary or Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab " tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: Club User wants to edit existing Return from Rehab tx - not Preliminary or Rejected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is not in Preliminary or Rejected state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files to the transaction
BUT user should not be able to edit any other part of the transaction

title: User wants to cancel existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes made
AND if form has been previously saved confirming cancellation should reload the form in default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save and up to cancellation point reflected
OR if form has not been previously savedf orm should be closed and no record should be kept and user should be returned to entry point of the transaction
BUT not confirming cancellation should return the user to the form and take no action

title: User wants to save existing Return from Rehab tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND transaction is not in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save existing Return from Rehab tx - Post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND transaction is in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN required field and formatting checks should be run
AND transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save existing Return from Rehab tx - First Time Saving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Return from Rehab" tx exists for a player
AND tx has not been saved previously
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display
AND transaction status will be set to Preliminary

title: User wants to receive error if creating a Return from Rehab tx for player who is at MN level
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to create a "Return from Rehab" tx for a player
AND selected player's pending roster (or current if pending unavailable) status is at the minor league level
custom_steps: WHEN club user selects "Return from Rehab" from the Major League Create New menu
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "This transaction is for Major League players only."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to point of entry

title: User wants to be prevented from initiating a tx for a player that does not belong to their club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as a club user and is attempting to create a "Return from Rehab" transaction for a player
AND player's Current Org is different from logged in club user's Org
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Return from Rehab" on the Create New menu in Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: User wants to receive error if creating a Return from Rehab tx for player that does not have valid MJ roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Return from Rehab" transaction 
AND selected player's pending (on submit) or current  (if pending is not available on submit, and on Approve) major league roster status is not  Rehab 7-Day Concussion DL, Rehab 15-Day DL, Rehab 60-Day DL, Restricted/Assigned, or Suspended/Assigned
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "The player must currently be on Rehab Assignment in order to be Returned from Rehab."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction

title: User wants to receive error if creating a Return from Rehab tx for player who has a pending or approved tx after entered assignment date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Return from Rehab" tx 
AND Placement Date on the transaction is before the latest approved or pending (Pending to Club, Submitted to BOC) transaction date for the player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error if entered return date is after Last Rehab Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to submit a "Return from Rehab" tx
AND Return date on the tx is after Last Rehab Date displayed on player's latest Rehab Assignment (including any extensions)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit" or "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "The return date, {0}, cannot be greater than the last rehab date, {1}."
AND "{0}" should be replaced with the entered return date
AND "{1}" should be replaced with the last rehab date from the player's latest rehab assignment (including any extensions)
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if placement is backdated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Return from Rehab" tx 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days prior to the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: User wants to receive error if placement is futuredated more than 10 days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Submit or Approve a "Return from Rehab " tx 
AND Placement Date on transaction is 10 or more days after the current date
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user sees error message "Placement Date must be within 10 days of submission."
AND clicking Back will close the modal and return the user to the transaction
AND clicking Ignore and Continue will ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC ONLY)

title: BOC user wants to receive an error if attempting to approve Return from Rehab tx with Placement Date after current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to approve a "Return from Rehab" tx for a player
AND "Placement Date" entered on the tx occurs after current date
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "This transaction cannot be approved unless the transaction date is on or before the current date."
AND clicking "Back" will close the modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Return from Rehab" tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Return from Rehab" tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Return from Rehab" tx
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign Transfer from Rehab Assignment tx
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Return from Rehab" tx
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a "Return from Rehab" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: Club basic - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club basic permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a "Return from Rehab" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Return from Rehab" tx (club-boc-tx-mn)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Return from Rehab" tx
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: User wants to receive error if saving Transfer tx with missing required fields or other on save rule violations
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is attempting to save a "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" transaction for a player
AND tx is in a submitted or higher state
AND required fields are missing or on save rules have been broken (according to data discovery)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should check all rules detailed in data discovery
AND system should display proper error for any rules that have been violated

title: Club user wants to receive notification on day 15 of player's 7-Day Concussion DL placement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved 7-Day Concussion DL tx exists for a player
AND current date is day 15 of the player's DL placement
custom_steps: WHEN the system runs the nightly check
custom_expected:
THEN an notification should be generated for the  player's Club MJ Transactions Admin and the BOC MJ Transactions Admin according to the Clipboard Requirements
AND clicking "Description" hyperlink on the notification should open the player's history in the same window/tab
AND clicking player name hyperlink on the notification should open the player's profile in view mode in the same window/tab on the Player History tab

title: BOC user wants to receive notification if a Place on 7-Day concussion DL tx is still missing "CDF" attachment 3 days after entered Roster Affected Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a submitted or approved "Place on 7-Day Concussion DL" tx exists for a player
AND the tx does not have an attachment with label "Concussion Diagnostic Form" attached
AND Roster Affected Date on the tx is three or more days before current date
custom_steps: WHEN the "Nightly Notifications" batch is run
custom_expected:
THEN an action item should be generated for the BOC according to clipboard requirements
AND clicking "Description" hyperlink on the item should open the place on 7-day Concussion DL transaction in edit mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking player name hyperlink on the item should open the player's profile in view mode in the same window/tab on the Player History tab

title: Club user wants to receive Action Item if a Transfer to 60-Day DL tx is still missing "SFD" attachment 3 days after entered Transfer Date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a submitted or approved "Transfer to 60-Day DL (MJ)" tx exists for a player
AND the tx does NOT have an attachment with label "Standard Form of Diagnosis" attached
AND  Transfer Date on the tx is three or more days before current date
AND form does NOT have "Received CDF" checkbox present
custom_steps: WHEN the "Nightly Notifications" batch is run
custom_expected:
THEN an action item should be generated for the Club MJ Transactions Admin according to clipboard requirements
AND clicking "Description" hyperlink on the item should open the transfer to 60-day DL transaction in edit mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking player name hyperlink on the item should open the player's profile in view mode in the same window/tab on the Player History tab

title: Club user wants to view Recertification tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to the Transactions Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertifications" should be a tab on the Transactions Dashboard
AND Clicking on the Recertifications tab should load the Recertification screen
AND Org header filter should NOT be available
AND The "Org" column should NOT display
AND Clubs should only be able to see their own players
AND The columns and layout should match the wire (with the exceptions noted above)
AND The view should be for the current calendar year (not changeable)
AND Primary sort should be by Player Last, Roster First
AND Secondary sort should be by Placement Date
AND Player column should display the player's Last, Roster First and be a clickable hyperlink to the player's player history
AND Attention required (icon) and player columns should be frozen
AND A player should have one row per DL placement (7-Day Concussion DL, 15 Day DL or MJ 60 Day DL) during the season currently being viewed
AND The DL-Type should display the type of DL placement associated with the row (EX: 15-Day)
AND The Placement column should be the Placement Date of the transaction that put the player on the associated DL
AND The "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire)

title: BOC user wants to view Recertification tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to the Transactions Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertifications" should be a tab on the Transactions Dashboard for MJ Transactions Admins
AND clicking on the Recertifications tab should load the Recertification screen
AND "Org" Header filter should be available
AND "All" should be an option as well as all 30 of the Clubs
AND by default the form should display ARI
AND the "Org" column should display
AND columns and layout should match the wire
AND view should be for the current calendar year (not changeable)
AND primary sort should be by Player Last, Roster First
AND secondary sort should be by Placement Date
AND player column should display the player's Last, Roster First and be a clickable hyperlink to the player's player history
AND a player should have one row per DL placement (7-Day Concussion DL, 15 Day DL or MJ 60 Day DL) during the season currently being viewed
AND the DL-Type should display the type of DL placement associated with the row (EX: 15-Day)
AND the Placement column will be the Placement Date of the transaction that put the player on the associated DL
AND the "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list (see wire)

title: User wants to see what Recertifications are due for a player on Recertifications tab - 7-Day Concussion DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has one or more recertifications due for a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Recertifications" tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND the first Recertification Due Date should be 7 days after the placement date
AND the following Recertification Due Date should be 7 days after the first recertification due date and so forth
AND each "7 Day" row should always show any Recertification Due dates that have passed, and the one that is next due that is in the future

title: User wants to see what Recertifications are due for a player on Recertifications tab - 15-Day DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has one or more recertifications due for a Place on 15-Day DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Recertifications" tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND the first Recertification Due Date should be 15 days after the placement date
AND the following Recertification Due Date should be 15 days after the first recertification due date and so forth
AND each "15 Day" row should always show any Recertification Due dates that have passed, and the one that is next due that is in the future (Ex: If there is a recertification due for a player on the 15 Day DL that is Due on May 1st, the form will display May 1st, as well as a May 15th Recertification due date, but will NOT display a May 30th Recertification due date until it is past May 15th)

title: User wants to see what Recertifications are due for a player on Recertifications tab - 60-Day DL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has one or more recertifications due for a Place on 60-Day DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Recertifications" tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_expected: THEN "Recertification Due" column should be blank (because there are no recertifications due for 60-Day DL)

title: User wants reinstating a player from the DL to update their information on the Recertifications tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has been reinstated from the DL
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Recertifications" tab
custom_expected:
THEN "Reinstatement Date" column should only be populated once the player has been Reinstated from the DL
AND "Reinstatement Date" column should have the Reinstatement Date entered on their Reinstatement for this DL placement
AND the "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND if the Reinstatement Date is on or before any of the Recertification Due dates listed - these dates should be removed from the form

title: User wants transferring a player to a different DL to update their information on the Recertifications tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has been transferred to a different DL
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Recertifications" tab
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertification due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND if a player is transferred to a new DL (ex: 15 to 60), it should display on a new row with the Placement Date = the transfer date
AND the previous DL entry should be updated to remove any of the Recertifications due that occur on or after the Transfer Date
AND when a player is Reinstated from the DL that was transferred, all rows should contain the same Reinstatement Date

title: User wants to view a Recertification associated with a date on the Recertifications tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has one or more recertifications due for a  DL tx
AND user wants to view a Recertification associated with a date on the Recertifications tab
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Recertifications" tab
custom_expected:
THEN each date contained in the Recertification Due column should be a hyperlink (with the exception of the future dated tx)
AND clicking on a blue or orange hyperlink should open the associated recertification tx (Blue and orange dates should have the title attribute set to "Open Recertification")
AND clicking on a red hyperlink should open a new, preliminary recertification transaction for the player. 
AND the recertification date should not necessarily match the date clicked on the form, but should match the first missing recertifcation for a player. (red dates should have the title attribute set to "Click to Recertify Player")

title: User wants to be able to distinguish the status of recertifications due by the color of the due date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has one or more recertifications due for a Place on 7-Day Concussion DL tx, Place on 15-Day DL tx, or Place on 60-Day DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Recertifications" tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN "Recertification Due" column should be populated with Recertifications that have or should have occurred, in a comma separated list
AND for a 7-Day Concussion DL placement, the first Recertification Due Date should be 7 days after the placement date. The following should be 7 days after the first recertification due date and so forth
AND for a 15-Day DL placement, the first Recertification Due Date should be 15 days after the placement date. The following shouldbe 15 days after the first recertification due date and so forth
AND each 7 and 15 Day row should always show any Recertification Due dates that have passed, and the one that is next due that is in the future
AND due dates that are in the future should be displayed in black font and bolded (They are NOT hyperlinks)
BUT for a 60-Day DL placement, there should be no recertifications due so the column should remain blank

title: User wants to filter Recertifications form by status of the Recertifications due
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a player has one or more recertifications due for a DL tx
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the "Recertifications" tab on the transactions dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN the first column should have an icon to indicate if one or more of the recertification due dates require some action from the Club
AND BOC and Club users should have a filter in the header of the form that allows them to select which rows to view based on the status of the recertifications due for each player
AND "All" should be the default option, and when selected should display All players contained in the widget, regardless of the status of their recertifications and SFD statuses
AND "Only Recert Past Due" should be an option, and when selected should display only those players contained in the widget that have a recertification due date on or before the current date for which no Approved Recertification transaction exists. (red hyperlink)
AND "Only SFD not received" should be an option, and when selected should display only those players contained in the widget that have a recertification due date on or before the current date for which the "SFD Received" checkbox is NOT checked on the associated Recertification form
AND "Both Recert past Due and SFD not received" should be an option, and when selected should display only those players contained in the widget that have a recertification due date on or before the current date for which no Approved Recertification transaction exists (red hyperlink) AND those players contained in the widget that have a recertification due date on or before the current date for which the "SFD Received" checkbox is NOT checked on the associated Recertification form

title: User wants to view existing Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Recertification tx already exists for a player
AND BOC or Club user has performed a transaction search
AND user sees the Recertification tx in the transaction search results
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the transaction from the transaction search
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will open in view mode in the same window
AND all fields will match data discovery and wireframe
AND clicking grey "Close" button will return user to their entry point into the transaction
AND field Current Status will display in red if the transaction is in a preliminary state, green if pending and black for all other states

title: User wants to create new Recertification tx from Player History - No Preliminary tx exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND no preliminary recertification tx exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Disabled List Recertification" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Disabled List Recertification" will cause the system to load a new preliminary transaction in edit mode
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to create new Recertification tx from Player History - Preliminary tx exists
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club or BOC user is logged in and viewing a player's Player History
AND a preliminary recertification tx already exists for the player within the last 10 days
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Create New" button on Player History Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Transactions" should appear as an option in top-level dropdown
AND "Major" and "Minor" radio buttons should be active
AND selecting "Major" should limit third and fourth levels to only MJ items
AND "Disabled List" should be an option under Major Transactions
AND "Disabled List Recertification" should be an option in the fourth level dropdown
AND selecting "Disabled List Recertification" will cause the system to load the existing transaction in edit mode instead of opening a new tx
AND all fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to delete a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx exists for a player
AND the tx is in a Preliminary state
AND a user is logged in with edit permissions for the form 
AND grey "Delete" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Delete" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form ("Are you sure you want to delete this ["Recertification"]?"Hint: This is a permanent action that cannot be undone.)
AND yes and no buttons should be displayed
AND clicking yes should close the form with no record kept and return user to entry point of the tx
AND clicking no should return user to the form and take no action
AND deleted tx should not appear on front end or be searchable

title: BOC user wants to be able to Reverse a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks grey "Reverse" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display relevant error or warning messages
AND successful reverse notification should display (message #79)
AND transaction status should update to "Reversed"
AND any action items generated by the transaction should be removed
AND reversed transaction should display in Player History with "Voided" in front of the transaction
AND user should see a "Suppress" button on the Reversed tx
AND player's Club, MJ and MN roster statuses, and level of play should update to their values from prior to the tx being approved

title: BOC user wants to be able to Suppress a Reversed Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a reversed "Recertification" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to suppress the transaction
AND grey "Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to be able to Reverse and Suppress a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an approved "Recertification" tx exists for a player 
AND user is logged in with permission to "Reverse and Suppress" the transaction
AND grey "Reverse and Suppress" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Reverse and Suppress" from the dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will first be reversed
AND player's Club, MJ, and MN Roster statuses and level of play should be updated to their values from prior to transaction approval
AND transaction should be suppressed
AND transaction should be hidden from player's Player History
AND transaction should be hidden from searches (unless BOC user searches specifically for suppressed)
AND transaction should be hidden from any other place it is visible on UI
AND any action item generated should be removed

title: BOC user wants to be able to Reverse and Suppress a Recertification tx - Not latest approved tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx has been submitted for a player and approved
AND user is logged in as BOC user 
AND user is viewing the approved transaction
AND player has one or more approved transactions dated later than selected transaction
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reverse" or "Reverse and Suppress" button
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error message "Only the player's latest approved transaction can be reversed."
AND clicking "Back" will close modal and return user to the transaction

title: BOC User wants to edit existing Recertification tx for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is not in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: BOC User wants to edit existing Recertification tx for a player - Approved or Reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as BOC user
AND form is in Approved or Reversed state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files, edit existing attachments, update Comments, and BOC notes fields
AND user should be able to edit any other part of the transaction not specifically stated as not editable post-approval in the data discovery.

title: Club User wants to edit existing Recertification tx for a player - Preliminary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification " tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is in Preliminary state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to edit all portions displayed on the form

title: Club User wants to edit existing Recertification tx for a player - Not Preliminary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx already exists for a player
AND user is logged in as club user
AND form is not in Preliminary state
AND "Edit" button is displayed on form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Edit" button
custom_expected:
THEN form should reload in edit mode
AND a "Save" button should appear in place of the "Edit" button
AND user should be able to attach new files to the transaction
BUT user should not be able to edit any other part of the transaction

title: User wants to cancel existing Recertification tx for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx exists for a player
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Cancel" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
THEN system should prompt user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes made
AND if form has been previously saved confirming cancellation should reload the form in default mode for the current state with none of the edits made since last save and up to cancellation point reflected
OR if form has not been previously saved form should be closed and no record should be kept and user should be returned to entry point of the transaction
BUT not confirming cancellation should return the user to the form and take no action

title: User wants to save existing Recertification tx for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx exists for a player
AND transaction is not in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save existing Recertification tx for a player - Post Approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx exists for a player
AND transaction is in post-Approval state
AND a user has opened the existing transaction in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN required field and formatting checks should be run
AND transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display

title: User wants to save existing Recertification tx for a player - First Time Saving
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx exists for a player
AND tx has not been saved previously
AND a user has opened the existing tx in edit mode
AND grey "Save" button is displayed on the form
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN transaction and its current values should be saved 
AND transaction should be reloaded in in view mode
AND successful save blue notification #77 should display
AND transaction status will be set to Preliminary

title: Club user wants to submit a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is attempting to submit a "Return from Rehab" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary state in view or edit mode
AND blue "Submit" button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND system should run On Submit rules check
AND after the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Approved"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful approve blue notification. Messages #76
AND no entry should be added to the player's player history
AND no notification for "Approved" should be generated since this transaction is auto-approved
AND no approvals item should be generated for this transaction either since this transaction is auto-approved

title: BOC User wants to approve a Recertification tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to Approve a "Return from Rehab" transaction
AND transaction is in preliminary state in view or edit mode
AND blue Approve button is available on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery. If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message
AND system should run On Submit rules check
AND after the rules have passed, the system should update the status of the transaction to "Approved"
AND system should reload the transaction in view mode, and display a successful approve blue notification. Messages #76
AND no entry should be added to the player's player history
AND no notification for "Approved" should be generated since this transaction is auto-approved
AND no approvals item should be generated for this transaction either since this transaction is auto-approved

title: Club user wants to receive notification when Recertification tx is reversed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a "Recertification" tx exists for a player
AND tx is not suppressed
AND a user is logged in as a club user for the initiating club of the tx or the club the player belongs to
custom_steps: WHEN "Return from Rehab" tx reaches an "Reversed" state
custom_expected:
THEN the logged in club will receive a notification
AND clicking on "Description" hyperlink in the notification will open the "Transfer of Rehab Assignment" tx in view mode in the same window/tab
AND clicking on Player Name hyperlink in the notification will open the player's Player Profile to the Player History tab in the same window/tab

title: Club user wants to be prevented from initiating tx for a player that does not belong to their Club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a club user and is attempting to initiate a "Recertification" transaction for a player
AND Org of the initiating user is not BOC or the Current Org of the selected player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Return from Rehab" on the Create New menu in Player History
custom_expected:
THEN system should display a blocking message "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization."
AND clicking "Back" will return the user to the entry point

title: BOC admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Admin user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Recertification" tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states
AND user should be able to create, delete, edit, e-sign and submit all Major league transactions for Major League players
AND user should be able to Approve, Reject, Reverse and Suppress all Major League transactions and see associated Flags

title: BOC basic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a BOC - Basic user
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to view, edit, or create a "Recertification" tx for a player
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and Print all major league transactions [Club and BOC] in all states for Major League Players
AND user should be able to view all flags for all transactions and transaction attachments in all states.
BUT user should not be able to make any changes or e-sign.

title: Club admin - user's Club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Admin Permissions
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Recertification" tx
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Admin user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states 
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign Transfer from Rehab Assignment tx
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club basic - user's club is "From Org" or "To Org"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has Club-Basic Permission
AND user is listed as "From Org" or "To Org" on "Recertification" tx
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in as Club-Basic user
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view and print all major league transactions in all states when the logged in Org matches the "From Org" for that transaction 
BUT user should not be able to view transactions in "Suppressed" state
AND user should not be able to edit or change these transactions
AND user should not be able to view "BOC Notes" field

title: Club admin - other clubs and BOC only tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user has Club admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view, create, or edit a "Recertification" tx
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all APPROVED (no other states) major league transactions including other club's Major League transactions or BOC only
AND user should be able to create, delete, submit, edit, attach files, and e-sign all Major League transactions for Major League players on their Org's roster or if they are the"From Org" or "To Org"
BUT user should not be able to see BOC Notes field for any transaction
AND user should not be able to see the Comments field for any transaction unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org
AND user should not be able to see attached Files section in the transaction form unless the logged in Org is the From Org or To Org

title: User should be prevented from creating or viewing a tx if they do not have permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in that does not have view permissions for a "Return from Rehab" tx (club-boc-tx-mn)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view or edit a "Recertification" tx
custom_expected: THEN user should not be able to view or edit transaction

title: Users should only receive action items/notification once
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC or club user is logged in
AND certain criteria is met for user to receive a notification or action item (missing SFD for example)
custom_steps: WHEN nightly notification batch is run
custom_expected:
THEN user should receive the proper notification/action item
BUT user should not receive the notification each subsequent time the batch is run, only once
